List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for all instrument drivers.

Definition at line 29 of file driver.h.

const XTime& XDriver::time (   )  const [inline]
 

recorded time. time when phenomenon finished and recorded. analyses must be based on this time. zero if record is invalid.

Definition at line 54 of file driver.h.

References m_recordTime.

Referenced by XTempControl::pid(), XNMRSpectrumBase< FRM >::visualize(), XNMRT1::visualize(), XNMRPulseAnalyzer::visualize(), and XMonteCarloDriver::visualize().

const XTime& XDriver::timeAwared (   )  const [inline]
 

time when an operator (you) can see a phenomenon. manual operations (ex. pushing clear button) must be based on this time. time when a phenomenon starts if measuement is on real-time. time when record is read if measuement is *not* on real-time. unknown if record is invalid.

virtual void XDriver::visualize (   )  [protected, pure virtual]
 

this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw() record is readLocked This might be called even if the record is broken (time() == false).

Implemented in XSecondaryDriver, XDCSource, XDMM, XDSO, XFuncSynth, XLevelMeter, XLIA, XMagnetPS, XMonteCarloDriver, XNetworkAnalyzer, XPulser, XNMRPulseAnalyzer, XNMRT1, XNMRSpectrumBase< FRM >, XSG, XTempControl, XTestDriver, XNMRSpectrumBase< FrmNMRFSpectrum >, and XNMRSpectrumBase< FrmNMRSpectrum >.
